snippet: With advice from more than 200 policy experts, Mrs. Clinton is trying to figure out how to address the anger over income inequality without overly vilifying the wealthy.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton has been meeting with economists and policy experts in order to craft platform that resonates with Americans who are concerned about income inequality but do not react well to vilification of wealthy; Clinton is expected to advance plan that would be more populist than centrist policies pursued by her husband former Pres Bill Clinton during his tenure.
lead_paragraph: With advice from more than 200 policy experts, Mrs. Clinton is trying to figure out how to address the anger over income inequality without overly vilifying the wealthy.

headline.main: Economic Plan Is a Quandary for Hillary Clinton’s Campaign
headline.print_headline: Economic Plan Is a Quandary for Clinton ’16
